originContent: Please note that before your evaluation process, when Docker loads the databases, errors may occasionally occur due to environment inconsistency (these will not terminate the process but will appear in the Docker logs). As a result, some databases may fail to load properly, leading to empty databases. This will cause the evaluation results to be abnormally low.
translatedContent: Please note that before your evaluation process, when Docker loads the databases, errors may occasionally occur due to environment inconsistency (these will not terminate the process but will appear in the Docker logs). As a result, some databases may fail to load properly, leading to empty databases. This will cause the evaluation results to be abnormally low.

originContent: üëâ Therefore, we strongly recommend checking the Docker logs for any errors **before running the evaluation** and verifying that all databases have been successfully loaded.
translatedContent: üëâ Therefore, we strongly recommend checking the Docker logs for any errors **before running the evaluation** and verifying that all databases have been successfully loaded.

originContent: üëâ We have updated the **Submission Guidelines**, where the customized agent scaffolds are supported. Please feel free to take a look at our detailed submission guidelines [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1F1DSqHDBzGvXFlWU8iCl9otkqxIefgcH/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=108161566779099489782&rtpof=true&sd=true).
translatedContent: üëâ We have updated the **Submission Guidelines**, where the customized agent scaffolds are supported. Please feel free to take a look at our detailed submission guidelines [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1F1DSqHDBzGvXFlWU8iCl9otkqxIefgcH/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=108161566779099489782&rtpof=true&sd=true).

originContent: - [2025-11-06] üêõ **Bug Fix** & üê≥ **Docker update**: Update the sqlglot version to 26.16.4 to fix the bug that the sql parser cannot parse the SQL correctly for user simulator. You could fix this by re-install it by `pip install sqlglot==26.16.4` in the `bird_interact_eval` env. The `bird_interact_eval` image is also updated, so you could also pull it and recreate the `bird_interact_eval` container.
translatedContent: - [2025-11-06] üêõ **Bug Fix** & üê≥ **Docker update**: Updated the sqlglot version to 26.16.4 to fix the bug where the SQL parser could not correctly parse SQL for the user simulator. You can fix this by reinstalling it with `pip install sqlglot==26.16.4` in the `bird_interact_eval` environment. The `bird_interact_eval` image has also been updated, so you can pull it and recreate the `bird_interact_eval` container.

originContent: - [2025-10-21] üê≥ **Docker update**: We added the docker for Full DB Env. And we pushed 3 docker images (Base/Full DB Env and the evaluation environment for both `a-Interact` and `c-Interact`) to Docker Hub to facilitate the environment setup. No need to download the DB dumps and build the images manually!
translatedContent: - [2025-10-21] üê≥ **Docker update**: We have added Docker for Full DB Env. And we have pushed 3 Docker images (Base/Full DB Env and the evaluation environment for both `a-Interact` and `c-Interact`) to Docker Hub to facilitate environment setup. No need to download DB dumps and build images manually!

translatedContent: It presents the full details, methodology, and evaluation of our interactive text-to-SQL benchmark.

originContent: - [2025-08-26] üöÄ We're excited to announce the release of the **[BIRD-Interact-Full (600)](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-full)** set!
translatedContent: - [2025-08-26] üöÄ We're excited to announce the release of the **[BIRD-Interact-Full (600)](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-full)** set!

originContent: It's a tough one ‚Äî the best LLMs are only achieving a **16.33%** success rate, with just **10.0%** on the `c-interact` and `a-interact` portions.
translatedContent: It's a tough one ‚Äî the best LLMs are only achieving a **16.33%** success rate, with just **10.0%** on the `c-interact` and `a-interact` portions.

originContent: - [2025-08-26] üíæ On another note, we've also released a SQLite version of **[LiveSQLBench-Lite](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/livesqlbench-base-lite-sqlite)** for easier local research.

originContent: The full **LiveSQLBench-Base** and **-Large** versions are coming soon!
translatedContent: The full **LiveSQLBench-Base** and **-Large** versions are coming soon!

originContent: - [2025-08-22] **Bug Fix**: In Bird-Interact-Agent code, we fixed a bug that when evaluating phase-2 SQL, the stored phase-1 SQL cannot be executed successfully, leading to a lower success rate of Phase-2. This bug only affects those tasks where phase1 sql does some operations on the database, e.g. CREATE table, etc.
translatedContent: - [2025-08-22] **Bug Fix**: In Bird-Interact-Agent code, we fixed a bug that when evaluating phase-2 SQL, the stored phase-1 SQL cannot be executed successfully, leading to a lower success rate of Phase-2. This bug only affects those tasks where phase1 sql does some operations on the database, e.g. CREATE table, etc.

originContent: BIRD-INTERACT, an interactive text-to-SQL benchmark, **re-imagines Text-to-SQL evaluation via lens of dynamic interactions**.
translatedContent: BIRD-INTERACT, an interactive text-to-SQL benchmark, **re-imagines Text-to-SQL evaluation via lens of dynamic interactions**.

originContent: The environment blends a hierarchical knowledge base, database documentation and a function-driven user simulator to recreate authentic enterprise environments across full **CRUD** operations.
translatedContent: The environment blends a hierarchical knowledge base, database documentation and a function-driven user simulator to recreate authentic enterprise environments across full **CRUD** operations.

originContent: It offers two rigorous test modes: (1) passive **Conversational Interaction** and (2) active **Agentic Interaction**, spanning 600 annotated tasks including Business Intelligence (BI), CRUD operations and etc., each guarded by executable test cases.
translatedContent: It offers two rigorous test modes: (1) passive **Conversational Interaction** and (2) active **Agentic Interaction**, spanning 600 annotated tasks including Business Intelligence (BI), CRUD operations and etc., each guarded by executable test cases.

originContent: Typical evaluations trigger 1,968-5,496 interaction turns between model and user simulator, while state-of-the-art reasoning models currently solve only **‚âà24%** and **‚âà18%** of tasks, underscoring the benchmark's challenge.
translatedContent: Typical evaluations trigger 1,968-5,496 interaction turns between model and user simulator, while state-of-the-art reasoning models currently solve only **‚âà24%** and **‚âà18%** of tasks, underscoring the benchmark's challenge.

originContent: style="width: 100%; min-width: 100px; display: block; margin: auto; ">
translatedContent: style="width: 100%; min-width: 100px; display: block; margin: auto; ">

originContent: BIRD-INTERACT supports two evaluation modes as mentioned above:
translatedContent: BIRD-INTERACT supports two evaluation modes as mentioned above:

originContent: - **c-Interact**: Conversational Interaction which is a passive mode and the workflow is fixed. The code and detailed information can be found in `bird_interact_conv`.
translatedContent: - **c-Interact**: Conversational Interaction which is a passive mode and the workflow is fixed. The code and detailed information can be found in `bird_interact_conv`.

originContent: - **a-Interact**: Agentic Interaction which is an embodied active mode where the workflow is dynamic and led by models. The code and detailed information can be found in `bird_interact_agent`.
translatedContent: - **a-Interact**: Agentic Interaction which is an embodied active mode where the workflow is dynamic and led by models. The code and detailed information can be found in `bird_interact_agent`.

originContent: We are releasing a lite version of BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-lite-exp`, which includes 270 high-quality real-world tasks specifically for PostgreSQL. This is a good starting point for quick experimentation.
translatedContent: We are releasing a lite version of BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-lite-exp`, which includes 270 high-quality real-world tasks specifically for PostgreSQL. This is a good starting point for quick experimentation.

originContent: The full version of BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-full`, is a comprehensive benchmark that includes 600 tasks for PostgreSQL. It covers a wide range of SQL operations and user queries. The full version is coming soon.
translatedContent: The full version of BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-full`, is a comprehensive benchmark that includes 600 tasks for PostgreSQL. It covers a wide range of SQL operations and user queries. The full version is coming soon.

originContent: | Rank | Model Name         | Normalized Reward | Avg Cost (USD)/Task | Level              |
translatedContent: | Rank | Model Name         | Normalized Reward | Avg Cost (USD)/Task | Level              |

originContent: > \* Budget Parameters: Starting Budget/User Patience Budget, measured by our virtual currency *bird-coin*s . Refer to [bird_interact_agent/README.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/bird_interact_agent/README.md#task-setting) for more details.
translatedContent: > \* Budget Parameters: Starting Budget/User Patience Budget, measured by our virtual currency *bird-coin*s . Refer to [bird_interact_agent/README.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/bird_interact_agent/README.md#task-setting) for more details.

originContent: Interaction-Time Scaling (ITS) refers to a model's ability to continuously increase its end performance through multi-turn interactions. When this interactive performance surpasses the model's idealized single-turn performance on a fully specified, unambiguous task, we say it satisfies the **ITS law**. As user patience grows and interaction turns accumulate, performance keeps improving, demonstrating that the model can sustain effective communication over extended dialogue. Currently, we only find claude-3-7-sonnet satisfies the ITS law.
translatedContent: Interaction-Time Scaling (ITS) refers to a model's ability to continuously increase its end performance through multi-turn interactions. When this interactive performance surpasses the model's idealized single-turn performance on a fully specified, unambiguous task, we say it satisfies the **ITS law**. As user patience grows and interaction turns accumulate, performance keeps improving, demonstrating that the model can sustain effective communication over extended dialogue. Currently, we only find claude-3-7-sonnet satisfies the ITS law.

originContent: 1. Run Docker containers for bird-interact-lite database, bird-interact-full database, and evaluation environment:
translatedContent: 1. Run Docker containers for bird-interact-lite database, bird-interact-full database, and evaluation environment:

originContent: > If you just want to evaluate on `bird-interact-lite`, you could comment out the [`postgresql_full` service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/./env/docker-compose.yml#L21-L31) in `docker-compose.yml` to speed up the environment setup.
translatedContent: > If you just want to evaluate on `bird-interact-lite`, you could comment out the [`postgresql_full` service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/./env/docker-compose.yml#L21-L31) in `docker-compose.yml` to speed up the environment setup.

originContent: The details about running **a-interact** can be found in `./bird_interact_agent/README.md`; and **c-interact** can be found in `./bird_interact_conv/README.md`.
translatedContent: The details about running **a-interact** can be found in `./bird_interact_agent/README.md`; and **c-interact** can be found in `./bird_interact_conv/README.md`.

You could fix this by re-install it by `pip install sqlglot==26.16.4` in the `bird_interact_eval` env. originContent: - [2025-10-21] üê≥ **Docker update**: Add the docker for Full DB Env. And we pushed 3 docker images (Base/Full DB Env and the evaluation environment for both `a-Interact` and `c-Interact`) to Docker Hub to facilitate the environment setup. No need to download the DB dumps and build the images manually! Please pull the latest images from Docker Hub and recreates the containers, e.g. using `docker compose down -v && docker compose pull && docker compose up -d --force-recreate`.
translatedContent: - [2025-10-21] üê≥ **Docker update**: Add the docker for Full DB Env. And we pushed 3 docker images (Base/Full DB Env and the evaluation environment for both `a-Interact` and `c-Interact`) to Docker Hub to facilitate the environment setup. No need to download the DB dumps and build the images manually! Please pull the latest images from Docker Hub and recreates the containers, e.g. using `docker compose down -v && docker compose pull && docker compose up -d --force-recreate`.
